# Appendix D. Seasonal and Trend decomposition using LOESS (STL)

## Broccoli

```{r}
#| include: false

library(fpp3)
library(tidyverse)
attach("data/fmvpEnvironment.RData")
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-stl_broccoli
#| fig-width: 6.5
#| fig-height: 6.5
#| echo: false

nvat_monthly_long_ts |>
  filter(vegetable == "broccoli") |>
  model(STL(price)) |>
  components() |>
  autoplot() +
    theme(
      strip.text = element_text(size = 10)
    ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
